column4: Is there a net install of ubuntu?  From my experience the cd install of ubuntu is COMPLETELY broken
what exactly is broke? i'm just curious
how did you remformatted your hard disk?
first I tried with the ubuntu installer...that did not do anything.  Then I used fdisk to reformat.  Then went back into the installer and tried again.  no luck.
isn't there an option ``use entire disk''? that doesn't work either?
what partitioning scheme did you choose?
I used automatic partitioning where there is a / and a swap
how many times did you try all together?
don't forget to tell everyone else what you think of Ubuntu
I like the idea of ubuntu, just think that implementation is bad, really bad.
too bad you don't get a chance to really try it out
but it's essentially the same installer (d-i)
